llm_res.rule: Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The function `transferFrom` should be implemented to allow transferring tokens on behalf of another account after approval.
